attributes.action: Withdraw Richard Kylea Cowie Jr.‘s (AKA Wiley) MBE due to his antisemitism
attributes.additional_details: “Wiley” has posted publicly on multiple social media platforms his extremely anti-semitic views. Due to this very serious and delicate subject, I do not believe he possesses the correct moral values that a MBE should have and that his MBE should be withdrawn. As a well known public figure who holds a MBE, this has brought the honours system in to disrepute.
attributes.background: Richard Kylea Cowie Jr. (AKA Wiley) should have his MBE withdrawn due to anti-semitic views

rejection.details: We cannot accept petitions about honours and appointments. Decisions about removing honours are made on the advice of the Forfeiture Committee and with the approval of the Sovereign: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/having-honours-taken-away-forfeiture
